projects.title: Enterprise Operations Dashboard
projects.problem: A growing logistics company struggled with fragmented data across multiple legacy systems, causing delays in decision-making.
projects.solution: Built a unified real-time dashboard consolidating data from 6 systems with role-based access and automated reporting.
projects.outcome: 40% faster operational decisions. 12-hour weekly time savings for leadership team.

projects.title: B2B SaaS Platform Redesign
projects.problem: User churn was increasing due to a complex interface that required extensive training for new team members.
projects.solution: Complete interface overhaul with user research-driven design, reducing time-to-value from days to hours.
projects.outcome: 68% reduction in support tickets. 3x improvement in user activation rate.

projects.title: Fintech Brand Launch
projects.problem: A stealth-mode fintech startup needed to launch their complete digital presence in 8 weeks.
projects.solution: End-to-end brand identity, marketing site, and MVP web app delivered with coordinated launch strategy.
projects.outcome: Successful product launch. 2,400 waitlist signups in first month.
